summary: An ordinance repealing section 3 of Ordinance No. 27497, entitled: "An ordinance relating to the regulating, construction and operation of electrical and other equipment in moving picture shows, providing for certificates of registration for moving picture operators, for fees for the issuance thereof, for the suspension and revocation thereof, granting to the City Electrician certain powers appertaining thereto, providing regulations governing a penalty for the violation of the provision thereof' approved July 3, 1911.
